hero.title: A Pathway to Martial Excellence
hero.subtitle: Embark on a Journey of Cultural Enrichment. Experience authentic Japanese martial arts and cultural training with master instructors.

asayama.title: Asayama Ichiden Ryu
asayama.description: A venerable koryū of comprehensive Japanese martial arts founded around 1566, emphasizing practical armed and unarmed combat.

kyudo.title: ANKF Kyudo
kyudo.description: The Way of the Bow - traditional Japanese archery focused on personal cultivation and ceremonial practice.

karate.title: Shotokan Karate
karate.description: One of the most widely practiced styles of Karate-Do globally, developed by Master Gichin Funakoshi.

aikido.title: Aikikai Aikido
aikido.description: The original foundation organization of Aikido, descended from Morihei Ueshiba, focused on harmony and self-defense.

iaido.title: Mugai Ryū Iaihyōdō
iaido.description: A highly regarded style of Iaido with strong emphasis on practical combative application and deep connection to Zen Buddhism.

aikijujutsu.title: Daito Ryu Aikijujutsu
aikijujutsu.description: A classical Japanese martial art recognized as a significant influence on modern Aikido and other martial arts.
